rules_text:
Lifelink
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, exile target artifact or enchantment you control, then return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step under your control.
rules_text2:
Inscribe [i]( Your enchantments can help cast this spell. Each enchantment you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1} or one mana of that enchantment's colors.)[/i]
Whenever an artifact or enchantment you control enters, untap another target nonland permanent you control.
{4}{W}{U}: Investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
